# init()

**Initializer**

Constructs an invalid Column.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Assigning an invalid Column to a column name in a DataTable will remove any Column previously stored under that name.

## Creating a data column

- **init(repeating:count:)**: Creates a new column with a repeating element.
- **init(_:)**: Creates a new column from a given sequence of elements.

items.description: Creates a new column with a repeating element.
items.name: init(repeating:count:)

items.description: Creates a new column from a given sequence of elements.
